channel.title: Hosted Redash EOL
channel.description:
I received an email suggesting that hosted Redash would be discontinued at the end of November 2020, with data being deleted 30 days after that.
I've just logged in to my hosted Redash instance and can see that it's still up and running - could somebody please advise;
1. When will the data _actually_ be deleted? 2. Is there some way I can manually delete the data myself? (I have admin privileges on the instance).
Thanks! Jack

item.title: Hosted Redash EOL
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
app.redash.io is now offline and deleted.

Read full topic
